channel.title: Comments on: Flooded
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: m
item.dc:creator: m
item.description: ok, so I know I said I can picture it in my mind's eye, and I know you have a picture of it up, but the picture doesn't really show the enormity of it if someone doesn't know what it looks like normally... that's all I meant:)
item.content:encoded: ok, so I know I said I can picture it in my mind’s eye, and I know you have a picture of it up, but the picture doesn’t really show the enormity of it if someone doesn’t know what it looks like normally… that’s all I meant:)

item.title: By: monica
item.dc:creator: monica
item.description: Don'tcha just love monsoon season? That's amazing that under the bridge flooded like that!!! I can totally imagine that in my mind's eye. I (hardly ever) rains in Southern California:) so enjoy it for me...and stay dry if you can!!!!
item.content:encoded: Don’tcha just love monsoon season? That’s amazing that under the bridge flooded like that!!! I can totally imagine that in my mind’s eye. I (hardly ever) rains in Southern California:) so enjoy it for me…and stay dry if you can!!!!
